mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point_charge_request ( user_id, amount, merchant_uid, status, created_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{amount}, #{merchantUid}, #{status}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id AS userId, amount, merchant_uid AS merchantUid, imp_uid AS impUid, status, created_at AS createdAt, paid_at AS paidAt FROM point_charge_request WHERE merchant_uid = #{merchantUid} LIMIT 1
